item.title: Something Went Wrong? Troubleshooting Your Chopin Store
item.description:
We try our best to design a fool-proof onboarding process, but things happen, if you see error messages or Patrick Star crying (hopefully really rare), let us run this checklist and troubleshoot together!

We also feature some commonly asked questions regarding images, google sheets, payment methods, and many more.

üìö We stop maintaining this troubleshooting guide. Read full content in docs ‚Üí

item.title: How to Configure Your Chopin Store
item.description:
After creating your Chopin store, you now need to 1) update the catalog google sheet with your own product information; 2) finish setting up your store in Chopin app, including appearance, social accounts, discount rule, free shipping threshold, etc. In this article, we will breakdown all the google sheet fields as well as explain customization settings. Let us help you create a store tailored for your business needs!

üìö We stop updating this guide. Read full content in docs ‚Üí

item.title: How to Create Web Store with Chopin and Waitress
item.description: Chopin by apio is a static online store generator that allows you to configure your online store in just a few clicks. In this post, we’ll show you how you create an online store with google sheet using Waitress (apio’s google sheet API microservice). Try now and start selling your products online!

item.title: Create an Online Store for FREE with Chopin
item.description: Are you looking for a free and easy way to create your online store? We have a solution for you - introducing Chopin by apio: a simple online store creator that allows you to configure your online store with google sheet. It‚Äôs a FREE tool with flexibility to customize and integrate with third-party API. No code required - Try now and start selling your products online! üõçÔ∏è Create your store with Chopin in 10mines

item.title: How to Create a Simple Email Sign Up with Waitress
item.description: Are you struggling with finding a FREE service to collect emails? Are you overwhelmed by all those fancy features provided by email marketing solutions? In this post, we will show you how to collect email from your website visitors with google sheet. Waitress - apio’s google sheet API microservice will help you to build relationship with users in less than 10 minutes and without using email marketing platforms. üì≠ See tutorial in docs

item.title: Collect Email Addresses without Email Marketing Tools
item.description: Collect emails from website sign-ups is one of the most crucial ways to grow your audience, whether you‚Äôre looking to convert subscribers to customers or to directly communicate to your clients. In this post we’ll show you how to setup easy email sign-up form with google sheet for free on your website. We built this service after looking into other email marketing platforms (MailChimp, Constant Contacts, OmniSend, etc.), comparing their services, plans, and going through those articles like Five Best Free Email Marketing Services.
